code: export var isLiked=function isLiked(likes,userId){return likes===null||likes===void 0?void 0:likes.some(function(id){return id===userId;});};export var calcDiscountPrice=function calcDiscountPrice(price,discount){return Math.round(price-price*discount/100);};export var createMarkup=function createMarkup(textHtml){return{__html:textHtml};};
